article.title: Asia_Minor_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: Asia Minoris an alternative name forAnatolia, the westernmost protrusion of Asia, comprising the majority of the Republic of Turkey. It may also refer to:

list.listitem: Asia Minor (instrumental)"Asia Minor" (instrumental), a 1961 instrumental recording by Jimmy Wisner (operating under the name Kokomo)
Asia Minor (album)''Asia Minor'' (album), an album by Jamaican-born jazz trumpeter Dizzy Reece
